title: The Orchad Street of Kolkata
review_text: This famous street, more like a road is dotted with lovely places to indulge in.. be it Flurys, Oxford or Park hotel, this is the place to hangout for sure to experience the sweetness of the city of joy.. As an architect I feel if the government makes this place fully pedestrian by diverting the existing traffic, then this place would be magical..

title: Tourist place
review_text: A very good place to enjoy. The street is filled with many shops selling food items and gift article.

title: Happening place
review_text: Its one of the most happening place. Full of life and you will get the best restaurants of kolkata all in one place here. And not to forget the discs,pubs and shops.....

title: Touristy place of Kolkata
review_text:
The tourist town of Kolkata, this part of the city. I actually stayed in the old town as this is exactly what I wanted to stay away from - flocks of tourists...so...not the biggest fan. 
Not that anything wrong with them, it's just not my thing.

title: Busy street in Kolkata
review_text: Even though there is nothing great, this is the only place where you can walk on the foot path, which has good restaurants, shops etc.

title: Happening place in Kolkata
review_text:
This place is full of renowned restaurants and eateries as well as important landmarks. 
The place is lighted and decorated during Christmas and New Year. It is worthwhile visiting at that time.

title: A street for hotels, bars & restaurants
review_text: This is generally an one way street. You can walk on the footpath and watch different establishments present at both sides of the road. Most of them are having significant value in the history of modern Kolkata. It was once the must go destination for Kolkata aristrocats.

title: Lost its charm.
review_text: Our walk down Park Street did nothing for us. The old charm is not there. We liked the food in Kwality Restaurant. Spencer's Grocery Outlet is well located and well stocked. Just two check out counters is not enough. They need a couple more.

title: The street of every eatery
review_text: From our college days to dating to anniversaries to all other celebration, Park Street has been the quintessential address most frequented. There scenario had now changed slightly, not much.. However, it now faces some competition from the newly bred delightful restaurants but this is still a favorite me.

title: Heritage touch
review_text: Park street is still seen as Heritage place and it is same as 10 years ago or more, the restaurants in the night are overcrowded which means there are not enough eating outlets like Delhi and Bangalore, the pavements are narrow and full of cigarettes smoke yet there is some nostalgic feelings in the air.

title: Busy noisy road
review_text: Like all the other main roads in Kolkata this is a noisy, full of traffic, full of people, lots of tiny shops alongside road

title: Not a Patch on the Past
review_text:
Park Street was once the creme de la creme of Kolkata's roads. There were restaurants here...that offered culinary delights from Europe to China. The shops were the ultimate shopping experience. The auction houses were treasure troves. 
Went there the other day...it is all there but everything has changed. It is still upmarket but the glamour is gone. Shisha sellers on the footpath! Bamboo flutes...Kashmir shawl exhibitions selling Ludhiana stuff. Come on!! 
But yes, Flury's remains. Giggles is smaller now. The newer restaurants have kept the flag fling high when the older ones shut shop. Rajniklal is still there but very little of the iconic Domitware can be found. Oxford Book shop is till there but the warmth has evaporated....the emphasis is on locating the book on the computer, making a sale and saying... go. Kwality is still around as is Park Hotel. The Post office is horribly crowded...the queue made me cringe. Times change. Park Street too has changed. It is still upmarket...but it has lost exclusivity...lost its glam factor. It is terribly, terribly crowded. The dream is dust...yet a little bit of the past still remains..walk down Park Street do not whizz past. What little remains will soon evaporate ;savour the last little left. More

title: Liveliest part of Kolkata
review_text: From high end restaurants to cheap bars and crazy street foods, you'll find everything in this place and you'll definitely fall in love. This place is decorated beautifully during the Christmas days and New Year eve. Music at Allen Park is something almost every Kolkatan in their lifetime came at least once for.

title: Heart of Kolkata
review_text: Park Street is the best place in Kolkata to enjoy amazing food. There are plenty of legendary restaurants here which will not disappoint you.

title: PARK STREET
review_text:
Kolkata and park street are almost synonymous to each other. A must visit street to see the vintage culture and heritage of the city. with its decorative lightings,festive atmosphere, good restaurants, bars, shops, etc. this street, now known as 
Mother Teresa Sarani, is a happening place all round the year.

title: Both modern and heritage street
review_text: A must visit street to see the culture and heritage. However modernisation taking over the street vintage heritage. Time to preserve now.

title: Best spot in town!
review_text: This street offers the best atmosphere in Kolkata with good restaurants, bars, shops, etc. Stay there if you have the opportunity!

title: Mrs

title: One of the fascinating place to go

This place has a lot of things like malls , restaurants, educational institution , clothing store and many more.I would say this area is really posh and hub of kolkata.

title: The Most Happening Place!!
review_text: Come winter and Park Street is the most happening place in Kolkata.The place has weird combination of offices, restaurants, educational institutions, classy showrooms and more.We visited this place during the Christmas week and enjoyed ourselves like never before.Park Street was lit up, live music at Allen Park,road side stalls selling sausages, sandwiches, toys and knick knacks etc, people queuing up to enter restaurants at 7.30 pm...It was just amazing!!

Walking down the this Street makes one feel the essence of Kolkata....the old and the new! The food street of Calcutta, the St. Xaviers college now University, the cemetery and not far away the house of Mother Teresa....

title: Shopping
review_text: Park avenue is a must for shopping in Kolkata. The atmosphere is very cultural and there are several shops, restaurants, and food carts to check out. Over the last few years I’ve seen kolkatas park ave evolve into a great place.

title: The city's heart of modern kolkata.

title: The high street of the city !
review_text: If you ever visit the mega city Kolkata - The is famed street will attract you . The high end shopping area is lined with best known names of brands locals / international alike . The glitzy eateries , pubs , clothing stores , electronics and the high end shopping reflects the pricy style of the shoppers . The stretch is enchanting during the day and night . The buildings of the last British empire here are witness to the time housing some of the headquarters of past and the present times . Well connected by the metro and by buses it is a hub of the city on the move .m More

title: Gorgeous Victoria Memorial
review_text: I loved this gorgeous monument which must be double the size of Tajmahal and no less than Tajmahal in terms of it exquisite carvings on marble which it is made of.. I still wonder why it is not categorised as 8th wonder!! It has exquisite gardens around, the management handles massive numbers of visitors each day.. It also tell us and gives briefly the British Raj History etc etc.. It's stunning. One must go there.. Had an amazing Guava sold by an hawker just outside the entrance gate.. Cheers

title: Great place to hangout!

Amolak Rattan Kohli 
Former governor of Mizoram

title: Amazing Cultural Experience
review_text: An incredible road, a must see in Calcutta. Plenty of shopping yet is always extremely crowded as India often is.

title: Christmas Delight
review_text: A totally unexpected display of Christmas lights and displays. Very popular. Shops,restaurants and hotels galore. Walk with the crowds to fully experience the locality.

title: Christmas at the Park Street ,kolkata
review_text:
Christmas here is beautiful,people throng the streets in thousands to join in the Christmas spirit and make merry. 
It is very well organised, no bad intent,no mishaps. U enter from a particular street and walk along with the crowd enjoying the food all along,clicking selfies etc. 
Each street is so beautifully lit. 
It's a lovely experience.

title: The markethub of Kolkata
review_text: Park street offers everything that you wish in the city from bars to restaurant to best maals and everything.

title: Christmas Celebration
review_text: Park Street is the most vibrant place during Christmas & New year. The whole street is decorated with colorful lights, Christmas trees, colorful balls, stars, tinsels. People gather there on these special days to enjoy & celebrate Christmas and New year. Both the sides of the street are lined up with different restaurants. Starting from KFC, Mamagoto, Hakuna Matata, Legendary bakery shop Flurys, olypub, mocambo, Peter Cat & so on. Allen park at the junction of camac street & park Street is specially decorated & stage is made where live performance mainly Christmas carols & jingles are being sung. Small cake stalls are there to sell freshly baked cakes, cookies. More

title: Excellent Christmas Celebrations
review_text:
One of the top places on my mind whenever to visit Kolkata. Just the vibe of the street is so good, u feel like coming here every time. Good places to eat, stroll etc 
And Christmas was just too special. Well decorated with stalls. Only thing missing was snowfall

title: Food and party hub of Kolkata City
review_text: Known for Christmas and New Year carnival, Park Street is lit up with lights and glamour every year towards December end. Huge crowd gathers from evening till mid night to make merry and rejoice. Govt. of West Bengal (India) make arrangement to stop vehicle movement in Park Street on the eve of Christmas. Rest of the year, despite being a busy road, restaurants in the area make good business due to their established name and fame. Popular nightclub Tantra is also located in Park Street.

title: Popular area in Kolkata
review_text: Park street in kolkata is one of the popular areas. It has many high ended shopping and eating areas spread around.

title: British architecture, hustling, bustling!
review_text: You won’t be short of finding places to eat here as there are many different options. Park street has a beautiful touch of olden British architecture. It’s a street that’s constantly busy! Nice place :)

title: Park Street -- walk over in the evening
review_text: Park Street had its charm in 1970 when I first walked through it. After 48 years instead of real upgrade, it has gone down the drain. Haphazard lighting, a few slick restaurants, but overall a very poor sight not worth a visit.

title: Glitzy soul of Kolkata
review_text: Park Street has for long been the glitzy soul of Kolkata. It has an abundance of chic restaurants, bars, discos, hotels and nice shops. The prices range from cheap street food to elgant dining. Some even refer to park Street as the "heart" of Kolkata. it might even be compared to its Downtown... of merely say thta it defies definition, but is a place that you MUST visit when you are in Kolkata.

title: Still the street of my young days.
review_text: No words to describe this particular area, my favourite place in my youth and I was the very first customer when Trincas opened its door to the young generations of the time!

title: The Downtown of Kolkata
review_text: Fancy a night out in Calcutta? One of the best places to be depending on what you want to Eat, Drink or Spend. A small stretch of 300-400 meters contains Hotels, Restaurants, Bars, Discos and Snack joint starting from Street food right up to fine dining.

title: Heart of Kolkata
review_text: Mother Teresa Sarani is famously known as Park Street. It is the main downtown area of Kolkata. Many Indian and International Cafes and restaurants have their shops here. There are many international clothing brands also having their shops here. This is the perfect place for city lovers. Here one will get everything which a city demands. I will definitely ask everyone to visit this place while visiting Kolkata so that one can truly get a glimpse of downtown of Kolkata city.

title: Manager Vinay - the Park Street Hotel
review_text: I just want highlight how attentive and good manager / concierge Vinay was, making our stay at the Hotel for one week very pleasant. He was extremely helpful with suggestions and guidance. Always with a very nice manner.

title: Elegant
review_text: This is my must go place when travelling to Kolkata. Park Street is the elegant and stylish area of Kolkata. Lots of restaurants, fashion stores, Hotels and bars & clubs. A must visit area

title: Must visit
review_text: Park street is something u just cant miss in kolkata.. it is a huge stretch filled with good restaurants.. though it is crowded like anythn.. yet i m fond of this place.. it somewhere reminds me of cp in delhi..like a miniature version.. at Christmas this place is lit up beautifully.. the best n some old joints are peter cat, barbq for chinese.. then u do have starbucks, hard rock cafe, mamagota some newly opened joints..

title: Busy place
review_text: busy busy busy over all very good, place is very hygienic, had a great experience,visiting soon in near future.

title: It felt like London
review_text: What a street to roam around in the evening, with all the best of restaurants which carry an old world charm. We went there each day of our trip, as one cant get enough in a visit.

title: A day tour in Central Kolkata (Park Street Area)
review_text:
Park Street is the heart of the city of joy. Communication is superb. It is well connected through metro, bus root to reach Howrah or Sealdah. Indian Museum, Birla Planetarium, Victoria are very near of it. Hotel, restaurant & bar are easily available to your lunch or dinner with your friends & family. Park Street is famous for its celebration of Christmas Day. One of the most preferable place for foreigners to visit. 
Must visit & enjoy

title: The Food Street of Kolkata - the most happening place to spend an evening
review_text: The most happening place to spend an evening while in Kolkata. This is actually a Food Street with so many restaurants offering a choice of cuisines, from basic popular ones like Kusum Kathi Rolls to premium star rated joints with Pubs & Discotheques. You can easily reach by the Metro as it has Park Street Station & just stroll along. Park Street Cemetery is on the other end . This street also offers some of the best accomodation options, from Budget Hotels to 5 Stars.

title: The heart of Vibrant Kolkata
review_text:
The heart beat of Kolkata,especially during X-Mas till New year eve,one must visit and witness mad croud pouring in.For a moment you may think you are in London! The whole street glitters with lights and in total festive mood. Now let me tell a bit about history of this road.Originally this road was known as Burrial ground road,quite funny isn't? Reason being at it's south end still exist one cemetery-named South Park street Cemetery.Established way back in 1767,it has around 1600 graves of tombs,having many famous charecters like tombs of Sir William Jones,Henry Louis Derozio,W.L.Dickens(Son of poet Charles Dickens to name a few. 
On this road one can get Park Hotel and other food outlet like Flurrys,Peter Cat, Moulin Rouge. St Xaviers Collage,Asiatic Society and Assembly of God Church School.The name Park street came due to a deer park created by Sir Elijah Impey,Chief Justice of Supreme Court(Remember please,Calcutta was then capital of India)from year 1773 to 1789. At present this road is named as Mother Teresa Sarani. More

title: Cals best
review_text: Park street is definitely in the heart of the action in kolkata. Would highly recommend going here next time.

title: Victorian Memories, fits the latest and the Modest

title: Park Street, the most happening place in Kolkata
review_text: A great shopping place with fabulous restaurants nearby. You must visit Forum, Ritu Kumar's outlet, Stravee, Vidhata, Vibhabhari and many more shops all lined up on both sides of the street.

title: Shops in a lane
review_text: Many shops popularly known by no. Start at shop no. 1 which is towards the Metro to experience Park Street. Rangoli (no 97) has good collection.

title: Heart of kolkata
review_text:

As a tourist you must visit park street as a mall road experience. 
All festivals celebrate here with lovely decoration throughout the park street .

title: Modern Addition to Kolkata
review_text: This street houses most of the modern shops and restaurants of Kolkata, like Barbeque Nation, Naturals Ice Cream, Biswa Bangla House, etc. Must visit.

title: Park Street- A Must Visit
review_text: The most vibrant hub in Kolkata- full of restaurants, boutiques, entertainment places and work places. It is the go-to place for all types of activities. The perfect place to go with friends and family. Gets lit up beautifully during all the festivals. A must visit area in Kolkata.

title: Heart of City
review_text: I liked and enjoyed very much ,,,,,Olys pubs ,tantra and many more exciteing night life bars to enjoy

title: Best Bookshop
review_text: Best bookshop in Eastern India The Oxford Bookshop with a cafe. Fantastic collection of titles in English covering all topics. Also great Fountaon pens at a third of the price in Europe, with pens from Sheaffer, Waterman, Cross etc. Well worth a visit and if you buy more books than you can carry get will arrange to post to you.

title: Intellectually beautiful street!
review_text: Safe and spacious all day long. Walking around the Park Street and Mirza Galibh street, the festive beauty, the cultural intellect kept hitting me. The street evolves from the office folks in morning to lively evening and fun nights. The Russel street and Mirza Galib street crossing was the highlight. A lot to appreciate and a lot to absorb!

title: Nice place

This is really nice place and it's center of attention.

title: Party place
review_text: The place is the hotbed of pubs, discotheques and restaurants in Kolkata. The place springs to life post 8 pm

Topmost brand shop and restaurants are located there. Must go place and walk down in all the lanes in the evening and early morning a great place to be in.

title: Great place to talk and hangout
review_text: I often come here to have a business meet or great talk with friends and corporate meet ups. A must visit for travelers too. This is the most happening place in town.

title: visit
review_text: The most happening place of kolkata with lovely eating joints catering for all pockets. Must go place and walk down in all the lanes in evening a great place to be in.

title: My most favourite street in India
review_text: If I am asked about my most favourite street in India, unmistakably it's Park Street. It's associated with gracious memories and nostalgia as well. My dearest destination here is the Oxford Book Store, which has greatly contributed to my reading habit since the college days. My next favourite destinations here are the Park Hotel, Flurys Tea Room and the Chinese Restaurant, Marco Polo. I have visited Park Street on innumerable occasion and the best moment I like is the New Year Eve. There may be issues about car parking, there may be isses about overcrowding, but the moment of ushering in a New Year, when everyone comes out and greets each other, even the unknown, is a moment to cherish for a long time. More

title: Park Street is the best place to visit in Kolkata
review_text:
We visited Park Street in on 6th Oct, 18. This is one of the best places in Kolkata. I originate from Mumbai and this place reminds me of the same. 
Awesome restaurants for foodies and beautiful churches to visit as well. 
If you wish to explore some bakeries then go ahead and visit Park Street. You think of a cuisine and its available at this place. Although there are a lot of parking issues, especially if you are taking hi our 4 wheeler, but you may find it somewhere. 
But, visit Park Street especially during Christmas and it will be one of your most memorable visits. But be prepared there will be loads and loads of crowd, but it's fun too. More

title: Mere Hype
review_text: It is an average market which you find in practically every town in the country. It is very crowded. I don't know why it is so hyped. There are just nice big shops selling various things. And there are many eating places and restaurants. Surely avoidable

title: Spent some time walking down

title: Main Street
review_text: Park steel is full of restaurants, shops, hotels, pubs, clubs etc and one of the busiest & well known streets of the city, A truly tourist place.

title: Lively place with lots of activity and visit place
review_text:
Lively place with lots of activity and visit place
