title: Close to our hotel and packed as ever
review_text: Landed in Kolkata on Christmas day last year and straightway walked over to Park Street . Was simply jampacked and totally full with people celebrating Christmas. The street is filled with restaurants..shops..promises to be a great shopping hub..will visit once more

title: connought place of kolkata
review_text:
we enjoyed the stroll down it as we walked to Flurry's 
Iconical for Kolkattans just the way cp is for delhited. 
Shops and eateries abound. 
Strolling down pre dinner would be a good idea and dining options in the entire gamut are plentiful 
Incidentally the oxford book store here is amongst the best i have gone to ever.

title: Life of Kolkata
review_text: Park Street - the oldest ‘happening’ spot of Kolkata. Victorian buildings, shopping and all kinds of eateries. Enjoy a fun filled dinner here.

title: Dinner with family at Kwality
review_text:
Kwality is a age old favorite of Kolkata. Its famous for its Northern Frontier Food of India though its other choices in Continental Cusine is worth a try too. 

Their Pindi Channa & Paalak Cream worth returning for repeatedly which is probably true for the other items ( Both Non Vegetarian & Vegetarian ) on the menu too. 

Situated on the Iconic ' Food & Night Life ' Street of Kolkata 

Definitely worth a visit.

title: Shopping
review_text: Busy crowded shopping street with som high end stores. Can get respite from heat in air conditioned stores. Not a place for bargains

title: Glimpses of British Calcutta & Modern Kolkata!
review_text: One of the most popular places in Kolkata. You can still see the glimpses of British Calcutta & Modern Kolkata where old places & cuisines beautifully merge into new & modern places & cuisines. Must Visit!

title: Park Street has been the recreation zone for Kolkata people.
review_text: It's important thoroughfare connecting Central Kolkata ( Calcutta) to North Kolkata from 7 am - 1 pm and then from 1- 10 pm with South Kolkata as it's a one-way traffic. After the demise of Saint Mother Teressa, it's renamed as Mother Teresa Sarani, but people still call it as Park Street. The road has a number of bars and restaurants, Mall, Star Hotels. It's entertainment hub of Kolkata. It is still one of the prime commercial and entertainment zones of the city. Park Street is traditionally decorated with lights on Diwali, Christmas Day and New Year's Eve. For the outsiders, I mean visitors Flury's the confectionary is a must for the breakfast. More

title: Nice Road
review_text: There are some bar , hotel and shopping mall. A crowded place, Every visitor goes there to explore the kolkata.

title: You'll turn lively
review_text: This is one of the busiest streets of Kolkata. The main attraction of this place is thousands of restaurants of various types. If you're a foodie then you should try this out. This place has a huge charm during christmas and new year. It is beautifully decorated but the crowd may disappoint you.

title: Comfortable stay
review_text: The stay was confortable with good staff in handling rooms are very clean front office staffs are very friendly and polite overall it’s good to stay here because of popular clubs and bar and shopping .

title: official visit to this place specially Mirza Ghalib Lane
review_text: very busy area, with full of hustle and hustle. inspite of that is a very lively place a number of good restaurants and malls

title: Park Street
review_text: its a station next to esplaned.although its not a tourist place but you can find something new in here.you will get a lots of old vintage and heritage buildings here.

title: Journey back into time
review_text:
Go here to experience the soul of the old city. Thin streets meandering into one another, knick knack vendors lining the whole area with all sorts of interesting stuff which is irresistible, old structures reminding of the good old times, tempting street side food, you have it all here. 

A part of the city which makes you reminescent of the old times, and at the same time brings you closer to the actual spirit of the city. 

Feel the real Calcutta here, away from the modern times' malls and sprawling shopping complexes, and you will go back charmed, wanting to be back once more

title: Trip
review_text: The restaurant had a great spread during breakfast. They had number of options for vegetarians. The behavior of the staffs at the desk was as per hotel standard which is impressive. Interaction with Adriza at Roxy was memorable.

title: A piece of old anglicised india
review_text: Free Wi-Fi,restaurants,bars,pubs,star hotels,music,christian school and college,streets are different from what we are habituated to see in Kolkata,a place to enjoy 24×7×365

title: A lovely outing and wonderful time spent
review_text: Many parks and sitting are there. Outing in the evening was good one. Many restaurants are nearby. Parks in the evening as some had colourful fountains which starts in the evening.

title: nice shopping
review_text: I have done nice shopping at park street area in kolkata , u get every thing here all types of cloths

title: The grand Kolkata street
review_text: Park street is an iconic street in Kolkata which is lined with various restaurants, hotels, bars, shops and residences. During Christmas and new year it is really illuminated with lights. It’s a great place to be but be aware of the huge crowds which at times could be unruly and dangerous.

title: Heart of kolkata
review_text: One of the most prominent places that Kolkata offers. A lot of old and gold eateries around here. Must visit on a weekend for the feel of Kolkata nightlife.

title: charm of kolkata
review_text: its party on streets at park street....the best and most posh location of kolkata brimming with top bars & restros....lively ....

title: A busy aristocratic place
review_text: Always a popular historical place to spend time here.trum,bus,taxi, personal card all in all quite busy all the time.many big companys are taken that place to established.many hospitals like 'pg' are situated here.the communication are always good here for short or long journey.

title: Wanna have something?
review_text: If u want to live in luxary why not here??.. the luxiorious after south kolkata here u can get anything .. yes u heard it right just anything have a visit i will not tell u much

title: Best destination for lovely food shopping and enjoyment
review_text:
This place can never be boring . The most famous eating places with taste and quality are here . One can go there everyday and you can never be tired rather feel wonderful . 
Governor Amolak Rattan Kohli

title: Party Place in Kolkata
review_text: With lots of Pubs, Restros, cafes, Shops you can enjoy your time out here. Must Visit place in Kolkata.

title: Heritage
review_text: An important place covered by Historical events. Even now it is the important part of Kolkata. Visit must.

title: Where is the Calcutta Romance Gone>?
review_text:
Shabby with footpaths encroached even the new slick restaurants look shabby. 
The Paris of the East is gone

title: Good restaurant and shopping mall
review_text: It's nice to visit Park Street in Kolkata. The street is clean and tidy, have a good restaurant and shopping mall in there.

title: Vibrant street
review_text: This by far would be the most vibrant street in Kolkata. Specially if you are a foodie this is your destination. Right from Flurys to Mc Donald's you can find a variety of joints here. Also the famous Kolkata rolls near Park Hotel. Don't miss a visit to the street if you are in Kolkata around Christmas and New year.

title: Street of Kolkata - Park Street
review_text: Cleanest and Most Beauty street of Kolkata the city of Joy, One should visit the stree specially those who are foodie people.

title: Hang Out Zone :)
review_text:
This place has Flurys..Park Hotel,,,,, and so many other great places to visit. 

During X'mas..its another zone only.

title: Great place
review_text: This is kind of a central area where you can find all the big hotels and the famous food chains. It is a busy place because many big offices located here. One must visit the place on 25th Dec and 31st Dec night for beautiful light show and much celebrations. You can find flurys,spencer,barbique nations,peter cat,starbucks etc over here.

title: Park Street in Kolkata
review_text: A beautiful street in Kolkata and the city’s central place for nightlife. You can find several reataurants, bars and clubs, especially nearby Park Hotel

title: Old charm missing
review_text: Park Street has the old names but not the old charm. A visit down memory lane is not really possible because everything seems different: more glamorous, more fast. Even Oxford book store stocks things other than books. The street booksellers are still there but not open to bargaining. Flury’s is more expensive and posh. And the speeding one-way traffic makes a run across the street to greet a friend on the opposite footpath well nigh impossible. But time and tide waits for no man - and the new Park Street is still worth a visit, a stroll - and a little shopping.

title: Having great dinning at the bridge..
review_text:
Great variety of food..nice friendly atmosphere..all staff was very nice...and special thanks to "Kakan Roy"..we were welcomed with a big smile.. through out she was very efficient, enthusiastic añd caring with us and all the other guest around..kakan keep up the good work!! 
These kind of people are assets for the company.

title: very nice place to hangout
review_text: It is a good and posh place but mostly crowded only. It has lots of well known restaurants bars and saloons.

title: Buzzing
review_text: Practically a restaurant row, with all kinds of eateries to be found here, its own Metro station, easy accessibility, shops etc. Many highly recommended restaurants found here. Park Hotel is home to several nightclubs. Just be careful at night as shady characters appear out of nowhere, chiefly pimps.

title: Excellent Shopping street
review_text: Go there during the late evenings, lots of showrooms and lighting, surrounded by all the destinations of Kolkotta

title: Heaven for shoppers
review_text: Good for budget shopping and loads to chose from. But you get what you pay for so cheap is not always good. Make sure you keep an eye on your belongings for it can get very congested.

title: Park Street Kolkata
review_text:
Kolkata's Park Street is food heaven for its people, housing various iconic eateries like Peter Cat, Moulin Rouge, Mocambo, Flury's, Trinca's, Barbeque, etc. Residents and visitors flock to the place to get a taste of authentic Anglo-Indian and Continental cuisine. Particularly during Christmas and New Year, Park Street is overflowing with people eager to participate in the revelry and celebrations. 
Parking is a major problem...so be prepared to walk a bit. 
If you are not comfortable in crowds and prefer quiet and peaceful places, don't come to this area.

title: Nice market
review_text: Park street is very good place for shopping,food and roaming...market is very neat and clean...there are many good cafes and resturants..

title: Great place
review_text: It is an amazing road with both sides full of happening outlets, food joints, brands etc. You can find hard Rock Cafe etc and can walk along the street for fun filled experience.

title: Happening place
review_text: This is very happening place. This areas has some of very good known restaurants. This is suppose to be top areas of Kolkata. Even this area has good shops for shopping.

title: Flurys and Balaram Mullick
review_text: Walk to Flurys- I have a crazy flowing near my home for Flurys products. Walk down to Balaram Mullick for the mouth watering sandesh and kala jamun etc.

title: Roam, party, eat
review_text: place if full of wonderful eateries and some must try street food. have been to this place many times and its a delight everytime.

title: Alluring Building and Architecture
review_text:
I am from Delhi and visited Park Street to find good restaurant.Once I visited Park Street it reminded me of Cannaught Place of Delhi. 
Street is full of life and you will get various restaurants to get the food of your choice. 
Food is delicious and cheap compare to Delhi and NCR. 
If you are in Kolkata then don’t miss this place. 
Cheers

title: The place to be in Kolkata
review_text: Ambience awesome and thrives with people from all walks of life.. You can feel the life of Kolkata at this place.. If you have not enjoyed at an eatery here or walked along the park street, you have missed a good part of Kolkata

title: The Happening Heart of Kolkata
review_text: It is the most happening area of the city of Kolkata.. The street extends from Jawaharlal Nehru Road to Park Circus with AJC Bose Road in between.. South Park Street Cemetery is on one end of the street, which really a heritage. Many of the good schools and colleges are in Park Street, which includes St. Xavier's College.. Most of the famous restaurants and eateries in the city are located here. The Park Hotel is one of them.. World famous Asiatic Society is located on the Park Street Chowringhee crossing..

title: Happening place of Kolkata
review_text:
If you want to have good variety of food, just come to park street! 
This place a hevaen for food lovers. 
To get car parking is very difficult. Its better to cab it and walk around! Not many shops for shopping. Filled with all types of food joints

title: The main party place of Kolkata
review_text: One of the main party places in Kolkata with fancy bars and pubs, nice cafes, the iconic Park hotel and the famous flury's. This is the place to visit at least once if you're in the city.

title: Popular street in Kolkata
review_text: As a tourist to Kolkata, I had heard a lot about this street. Turns out, it is one of the most popular street in Kolkata, for shopping, hangouts and eateries. It is a very famous street which is a complete blend of cultures. There are a number of shops and restaurants on the street which are easy to get to. You can do most of your shopping here and also find every type of eatery to suit your tastes. The European architecture is easy to notice here, however, not a must visit place in Kolkata. If you are not into shopping, you can simply drive through the street and take a look at the buildings. More

title: Loads of Eateries
review_text: This street lives up to its name. It has a range of restaurants along its length but some can become very busy. Many restaurants are quite suitable for Europeans to dine in. We ate in two with no ill-effects.

title: The very very known path through which sued to go to Maidan
review_text: It is a heart touching place for me. I was born and brought up in Benepukur Road, Kolkata. During my Schooldays I used to go to Maidan, to watch football matches, from Mullickbazar straight to Maidan on foot through this very street only. I cannot forget each and every corner of this street. Later on, I have moved through this road several times by vehicle but the memory of my walking through the entire street is unforgettable.

title: Memories...
review_text:
A lot of past memories for me on this street as a regular visitor to Calcutta in my teenage years in the 1980’s. And this was the street where everything was happening, all the nice restaurants and clubs I especially remember Sky room and Blue Fox, even Waldorf Chinese! All gone. 
Still now it’s an interesting street and important area of central downtown Kolkata however they could do more to preserve the buildings and sidewalks which are mostly in sad shape. Only made worse by the rush of growing number of people and cars. 
I’d still recommend a visit to anyone visiting Kolkata to come here though, there still,are some nice restaurants and interesting and quaint shops. More

title: A beautiful mix of party and culture
review_text: Amidst some the most fantastic nightlife hot spots, some of the architecture on this street blew my mind. It’s quite beautiful. As we stayed on this street itself in the fantastic Park Hotel, I got to explore this street I’ve heard so much about from friends and family. This was my first visit to Kolkata and I hope it isn’t my last :)

title: Christmas celebration
review_text: This is one of the hot and happening place of Kolkata.. The road offer variety of shops be it shop selling perfumes to bakery shop to multicuisine restaurants.. The area fully decorated with light at the time of Christmas it is a must visit for people outside Kolkata..

title: Hyped place
review_text: I had been to this place but I don’t understand why so hyped as the area is mostly crowded by vehicles and no good lighting and not even footpath available.

title: Cheap..cheaper..on bargaining
review_text:
The place is fill of small shops with shopkeepers trying to sell clothes and "leather" goods at a throw away price the fun is that you can get them to sell it for 25 to 40% of the quotes price at least on purses! 
There are lot of areas to savour the local delicacies also!

title: The life of kolkata
review_text: Park Street is the life of kolkata. Lots and lots of restaurants and lots of shopping. Good night life. A must place to be visited during the Christmas season... but be careful about the rush that time.

title: Must visit
review_text: If you are visiting the city from out of town, this is a must visit. An active part of town with a mix of shops, restaurants, hotels, nightlife, and others. There is something available for all ages. Make sure that you explore the adjacent streets for pleasant surprises as well

title: The Heart of 19th century White Kolkata
location: National Capital Territory of Delhi, India
review_text: Park Street was the white town in colonial Calcutta that also had a mixed population of Armenian businesses,Jewish traders and Baptist educational institutions. At present it is the heart of old houses (badly restored), famous restaurants and offices. Off Park Street one can walk through Free School Street and the famous Hogg Market that is also known as the New Market. This area is signature Calcutta....In small roadside shops selling everything imaginable to the iconic Fleury's where one can sit over a cup of darjeeling tea and watch the world go by through its imposing glass windows. One is sure to discover a different tempo than one is used to...A time of slow and rich rhythms, a world of imaginations and conversations... More

title: Park Street
review_text: One of the busiest street of the city witnesses 24*7 service. You will find too much hotels and also the cheap one here. Tourist reside here.

title: Great night life
review_text: The place is list up during night. It's a great walk around with many food places - street food to fine dining restaurants.

title: The vibrant street of Kolkata
review_text: Park Street is the best place to look for all kinds of branded items and also for the local ones. You can have a stroll around this area and you can see the real vibrant Kolkata

title: Must visit while travelling to Kolkata
review_text: Heritage building encloses number of shops offering varieties of products, restaurants etc. Prime location of Kolkata.

title: Connaught Place of Kolkata.
review_text: Park Street, officially named Mother Teresa Sarani and earlier known as Burial Ground Road, is a famous for its various option of Shopping and Restaurants, all major branded showrooms available here. It can be Connaught Place of Kolkata.

title: Park Street Kolkata
review_text: Stree name it self discribe the area, the street is full of Shopping and Restaurant lost of option for buying and foods almost all branded shop will be here, there is one mall next to the sreet, also Good Stay Options are available.

title: Caters for every taste
review_text: Shopping, restaurants are just fantastic. My favourite store for shopping for sarees must be one of the smallest (Lakshmi the Sree Shoppe). But its contents and attention are out of this world!

title: mother theressa sarani
review_text: Now renamed as Mother Theressa Sarani is a street bustling with activity.A must destination for shopping as it has wholesale market. it is also popular as food street.It is the hub of entertainment with pubs and nightclubs.It deserves the name ' the street that never sleeps'.

title: Heart of the "CITY OF JOY"
review_text: Don't miss the area. It has the charm of the grand old city and is it's nerve centre. From shopping to eateries to grand feel of the city's downtown, park Street has it all to meet needs of everyone from all economic strata. Your trip to Kolkata has to start with park Street. Don't miss it at any cost. This area will give you the exact flavor of what city has to offer you.

title: Always welcoming
review_text: Best spot in kol to be in especially in evenings. Flurry Naturals and some other well known places. This is heart of city and being heart of city of joy means a lot

title: Heart of City of Joy - Kolkata
review_text: This place is heart of the city. All the best restaurant in Kolkata from last 50 years or more are here. famous kati role of Kolkata also available in this street. Its really busy street from morning to mid night. Its a must visit street in Kolkata

title: The Best Party Place
review_text: If you are in Kolkata, you can leave without visiting Park Street. May it be having the best food or may it be going to a disc or pub all is here. Saturday night this place is full. If you want fun this is the best place you can be.

title: The Most happening location in Kolkata
review_text: This area is full of British legacy converted now into an upmarket shopping & dinning area. Park street has Educational institutions to Office buildings to Hotels & Bar cum Restaurants to shops selling garments, books, Electronic Gadgets to Cars et all. It comes alive by early evening and stays alive till late into the night specially on weekends. One can find variety of food & drinks all around the street - from street food to upscale restaurants - from Indian to Chinese to Continental. A must visit place for everyone.

title: Party place
review_text: This place is home to the best party places in Kolkata. Just where the youth likes to handout. We went to Peter Cat and Some Place Else (The Park). Though The Park has a disc: Tantra, but the staff there is not courteous so we gave it a skip.

title: "Sahebiana" ---
review_text: Visited several times, in connection with various purpose including holiday visit with family. Remained almost same since long. Some landmarks like Music World has been closed. Best time to visit in winter especially on Christmas eve. Some of the best food joints like Kusum Roll, KFC,Flury's will tempt u to forget about calories!

title: Yesterday's glory, not so attractive now
review_text: Park Street was once a posh street with high end stores, restaurants, night clubs, etc. It used to glitter at night with lights and neon signs. Not any more. Now it is dusty, shabby, and gloomy. The stores and restaurants are still there, but there old glory is gone. Barriers on both sides of the road to enforce pedestrian crossings have created a nightmare. You wont miss much if you skip Park Street. But if time permits, make a quick trip there to see one of Kolkata's old glories.

title: Nice place, quiet calm.
review_text: Peaceful area.Auto, cabs easily available. Lots of small shops nearby for all your needs.Hotels and restaurants in this area are the best.

title: shopping n shopping
review_text: good market largely for clothing for men and women. but very difficult to find traditional Bangoli stuff like Kantha work etc. All modern stuff.

title: One of very important commercial points in Kolkata.
review_text: Park street is very busy and posh area. It is beautiful. Roads out here are clean and wide. One can find any shop starting from clothing brands to food outlets.

title: busy but fun
review_text: busy road with almost hundereds of food stalls and restaurants and so many cheap eating options , also many hotels situated here

title: best place in town
review_text: park street area is the best place in town with all the best restaurants, shopping areas , pubs & everything..

title: Place for Foodies
review_text: Parkstreet is one of the poshest areas of Kol. Arsalan is one of the famous restaurants out there. It's beautiful as the roads out there are decorated with lights and wall posts makes you feel you are in some other city.

title: Nice and Happening place
review_text: Nice & happening place, lots of food & shopping options. Can relish street food like rolls, beet cutlet and jhal mudi.

title: Place to be
review_text: The street is a mix of iconic restaurants ,bars , shopping areas , street food options ,etc.The Park hotel houses an iconic night club and a live music bar. The coffe shop serves liquor late into the night too. Try out Kusum Rolls and head to Flurrys for a tasty breakfast

title: Field Visit
review_text: A best place to see the wholesale market. A hunge universe of wholesale market near park street ....

title: City life
review_text: City life is the word for park street. You will have all kinds of restaurant,stree to roam around, park to sit and relax. You opt any mode of transportation which suits your pocket to reach this place.

title: Party hub
review_text: Kolkata's part hub is always ready to welcome you in all its glory with more than 50 place offering booze including some of the heritage ones like Peter cat, mocambo and oly pub!

title: The go to place for every age
review_text: Park Street is known for its expensive restaurants, pubs, bars, hotels, offices, expensive garment shops and the famous lighting during Christmas. Well it’s not Christmas now obviously and it is pretty hot now in Kolkata. I walked through the street gazing at both sides of the road. There is a certain charm in this place. I wanted to enter the park hotel, or at least one of its restaurants but dared not as I’ve heard its really expensive. The two famous restaurants of peter cat and mocambo on opposite sides of the road were totally empty. I believe its because people are now avoiding eating outdoors due to some certain recent revelations regarding the quality of meat being used in restaurants. Fortunately I happened to have visited both these restaurants earlier. More

title: Best street in Kolkata
review_text: Best street to hang out in Kolkata. Park street makes it the city of joy. Lots of restaurants, pubs, shopping and if nothing, just a walk on park street in the evening is sheer fun. Best around christmas with all the decoration. Park hotel, Mocambo, Petercat.. the list is never ending.

title: Drive around historic street
review_text: We went to Park Street since its quite a historic place. Lots of restaurants and is quite crowded in general. If you plan to walk, be careful.

title: Happening and bustling
review_text: Park Street is the smart, chic part of Calcutta. Many of the city's best restaurant are here...Petercat, barbq, flurys...This is a one way street and the best way to enjoy it is to walk. One can reach it by public bus and the metro. Park Street is also decked up during Christmas and is a visual treat.

title: Food and things to see
review_text: A great place to watch what’s going on and see life in India. There are great sites and great foods in the area Indian and others. A good area to visit

title: Hub of food,restaurant,pub & entertainment in Central Kolkata
review_text:
It is Located at the central kolkata. Old name is "Park Street" & new name is "Mother Teresa Sarani(road)". 

It is hub of food,restaurant,pub & entertainment till from British ages and continues its glory amidst of the newly developed mall cultures. 

It shows its glorious beauty in the eve of Christmas and till to the new year celebrations. 

A must visited place for every tourist visited in kolkata and placed in the core of the hearts of every bongs.

title: MOTHER TERESA SARNI
review_text:
The Mother Theresa Sarini is the new name of PARK Street. This street is one of the historical street of then Calcutta and now Kolkata, Best eating places are available here. Continental ,Thai,Chinees, Muglai and authentic Bengali food can be eaten to full satisfaction of you taste buds. Park Street remains Kolkata's foremost dining district, The Street that Never Sleeps. 

It originates from Chowringhee Road and connects to Park Circus 7 point crossing. Several important roads originate at Park Street namely Russell Street, Middleton Row, Camac Street, Wood Street, Loudon Street and Rawdon Street towards the South and Free School Street, Rafi Ahmed Kidwai Road towards the North. 

Park Street is decorated onDiwali, Christmas Day and New Year's Eve.This victoria time street is famous yellow colored cabs of Kolkata More

title: The defining hub
review_text: Park Street is another iconic one. The once Victorian buildings, now converted into legendary restaurants and office buildings. Yellow cabs bustling around and housing everything you need to hog on in Kolkata!

title: The one way street.
review_text: The calm and elegant park street is with good restaurants and shops.Flurry's cake shop is one of main attractions here.Indian museum is at walkable distance from here.As the street street is with one way traffic,it is easy to wait for booked cabs.The evening we went there a informal band of foreign students was playing music on the footpath.A nice place to spend evening.

title: Good street
review_text: Best restaurant are here . Must see. Also christmas carnival is something not to be missed with the whole street lighted up. Food stalls and eventa happening at allen park

title: One of the busiest and oldest street of kolkata.
review_text: One should go there during christmas and new year . They decorate it amaizing. Many famous and old restaurant here and there at the begining and famous school colleges at the end . One of the busiest road at the heart of the city . It is one way . At 2 pm they change the direction.

title: Heart of Kolkata
review_text: Love this place.This place is always well.decorated but at x_mas it looks awesome.people njy Christmas at this place throughout the last few days of December

title: The original Las Vegas of Kolkata
review_text: This was THE place everyone wanted to visit when in town until malls swarmed the streets of Kolkata. Even today a visit to this place is a must for the Kolkatans during Puja or Christmas or New Year. It houses the best restaurants in town...From Flurys to Moulin Rouge to the newest HRC or Starbucks, this place flaunts it all...

title: A stroll on Park str amidst a small storm
review_text: A place worth visiting the hotels restaurants and of course the bar and restaurant of Hotel Park a must go place if you are in Calcutta and have an evening to spare. I had a drink in “the Street” restaurant while it rained outside.

title: Nostalgic
review_text: If you really want to enjoy the night life of kolkata then do visit this place. Here you will find many pubs.

title: The most happening street of Calcutta!
review_text: Famous for food joints, educational institutions, churches and most recently HAPPY STREET. This place is best to visit during Christmas when the entire street is lit up and turned into a big food festival with 100's of food stalls.

title: The street to be at when in Kolkata!
review_text:
Bustling with crowd whether it’s 11 in the morning or 10 in the night! 
You will get anything and everything here. 
Kolkata’s all the major brands have shops here. 
Amazing food joints and even bars and pubs! 
This is the most happening place in all of Kolkata for sure!!

title: Buzzing street
review_text:
This is best place for couple stay in Kolkata.. 
it has everything including restaurant, cafes , bars, disco etc. 
also this is central location of Kolkata.

title: Good food joints and walking place
review_text: Park Street is a well designed place for food joints, shops and walking for a long time. This place is really clean, spacious and offers variety of this to do. I walked there for a long time and tried few places where found good food. Must go place!

title: A nice place for an evening stroll
review_text: Would love to be around this place at least once in a year. A great place to be around to enjoy the restaurant,a nice chill beer at one of the bars and an evening walk. What else would you want..a real place to enjoy the great old buildings around. Very specific the grand old buildings of the 19 th century...

title: Market Place with Food Joints
review_text:
Very near to Victoria Memorial. The street market is very nearby and good food joints are located in this area. The oldest pub Tantra of Kolkata is right here. 
It covers all the 3 major points for a family/friends tour i.e. shopping, food and entertainment.

title: Park street with memories ..
review_text:
Park street running from Chowringhee to the Park Circus Maidan could possibly described as an iconic street whose metamorphosis over the years should be highted .Till the late 60s it was the place to be in ..with imposing colonial mansions , restaurants and night life its said it was light years ahead .there was TRINCAS which had a afternoon jam sessions , there was Kwality where the likes of Rohit and Shakoor and PL Raj belted out Rafi songs .Pam Crain with her flourescent wig and Braz Gonsalves and Menezes in the jazz and piano scene active .Dotted along it were the infamous dance schools which were actualy the pickup joints . To the foodies , Bar Bq , Moulin Rouge and Mocambo and Kwality offered the best of the Indian and continental cuisine .Pieping next to ASiatic society and old stle waldorf towards the Macpherson square had the best Chilly chicken again a Calcutta invention .Strip tease and other bold shows made Calcutta the true Paris of the East .The only place you could get the 555 , Pall Mall cigarettes, the Cocktail Sobrainie packed in a glossy flatbox with a Cocktail.The cigarellos were Rs1per piece a big price colored individually were a hot with youngsters ... Later Calcutta got its first Disco in Park Hotel aptly called Mad House with upside down furniture later followed by Pink Elephant in the Oberoi.. That was the period after which the... Park street running from Chowringhee to the Park Circus Maidan could possibly described as an iconic street whose metamorphosis over the years should be highted .Till the late 60s it was the place to be in ..with imposing colonial mansions , restaurants and night life its said it was light years ahead .there was TRINCAS which had a afternoon jam sessions , there was Kwality where the likes of Rohit and Shakoor and PL Raj belted out Rafi songs .Pam Crain with her flourescent wig and Braz Gonsalves and Menezes in the jazz and piano scene active .Dotted along it were the infamous dance schools which were actualy the pickup joints . 
To the foodies , Bar Bq , Moulin Rouge and Mocambo and Kwality offered the best of the Indian and continental cuisine .Pieping next to ASiatic society and old stle waldorf towards the Macpherson square had the best Chilly chicken again a Calcutta invention .Strip tease and other bold shows made Calcutta the true Paris of the East .The only place you could get the 555 , Pall Mall cigarettes, the Cocktail Sobrainie packed in a glossy flatbox with a Cocktail.The cigarellos were Rs1per piece a big price colored individually were a hot with youngsters ... 
Later Calcutta got its first Disco in Park Hotel aptly called Mad House with upside down furniture later followed by Pink Elephant in the Oberoi.. 
That was the period after which the Commies put an end to the nightlife and Calcuttas Park street went into a deep slumber never ti regain its lost glory . More

title: Happening
review_text:
One of the most famous and happening place in Kolkata.Though there is a lot of development taking place around the new town, the charm of Park Street always remains alive.Starting from great food joints to book and magazine stalls you get it all here .... 
Whenever i am in Kolkata i make it a point to be here.Worth visiting and a must visit.

title: Taste of contrast that is Kolkata
review_text: Hustle of the crowds, high end restaurants and big clubs, street foods to satisfy anyone, and shops of all kinds. One street instant India for tourists as my friend says. Particularly special at Christmas with all its decorations and lights.

title: ELECTRIFYING
review_text: This is the go to party destination in calcutta. The street is brimming with restaurants and pubs and clubs.

title: Bustling street, great eateries and shops, well managed traffic
review_text:
Park Street remains my all time favourite from over the years. It’s still as busy and bustling, and has lovely restaurants including many old time favourites like Flury’s, Peter Cat and Mocambo. There are also lots of shopping options though you can get the same things cheaper in other parts of the city, if you have the time and inclination to go further away. 
Making Park Street one-way upto 10pm has made it more time consuming to get around it but certainly helps to manage the traffic and resultant chaos. Walking down the street is a good option to get around.

title: A street without Park but will full of surprises
review_text: I have visited this place for the first time in the month of feb 2018 & my stay in Kolkata was only for 4 days and I couldn’t able to stop myself to visit this place every night. It’s a hub of hopping, clubbing, food joints, restaurants and much more. Don’t forget to visit this place if you are in Kolkata.

title: Most happening road in Kolkata
review_text: Most of my favourite hotels, restaurants and cafes pf Kolkata are in Park Street. Some of them has long history and heritage and some other are contemporary but cozy and enchanting. When in Park Street, I always feel hungry and prefer to enter in Flurys or Peter Cat. Oxford Book Shop is my another favourite destination. Holidays are most enjoyable there and my friend says that night falls late at Park Street. Metro railway connectivity with all parts of the city made the place more popular and easily accessable.

title: Park Street the Pride of Kolkata
review_text: Its approx 3 km. Starting from AJC Bose to APC Road. Will find the old kolkata legacy here. The street is a business centre.

title: Best place roam with friends
review_text:
We three friends reached Kolkata on 2nd March 2018 and stayed at Minerva hotel Ganesh chandra avenue. 
Park street is easily accessible from our hotel through walking..I think 1..2 km from our place via Esplanade. 
The area park street is with new and old charisma. Many variety of food options are there.Book shops, commercial properties,etc also available. 
If you are interested in hot cocktails..singing bars . ..there are many choices..a little expensive ..quiet natural in these type of areas. Genarally safe place for night and day

title: Foodies Paradies
review_text: This is Kolkata’s heart throb , situated in the heart of the city of joy. This is most happening and amazing street which surrounded by many popular eateries, cake shop. This street mainly popular for its night life. The street look amazing especially in the month of December and January. If anyone from outside Kolkata want to visit this city I advise please visit in winter. That time not only Park street but also the total city of Kolkata looks more beautiful, its fully decorated with lights in most of the popular places. One can truly enjoy the winter here.

title: Street for foodies shoppers
review_text: One of the brightest lanes in Kolkata with n numbers of eating and shopping places, with pubs. Visited flurys, mogambo and had a great food.

title: Amazing Street
review_text: Amazing street filled with eateries,pubs and discs. You find everything and anything here. My favourite eating joint The Rajdhani. Amazing thali they serve. One of the must haves at Park Street. Everything and every area in near proximity.

title: Happening
review_text: This is the most happening place of kolkata. You will find lot of posh hotels and restaurants here. Lot of commercial establishments located here.

title: Park Street
review_text: this place is very crowdy and so many shops are there. and food stalls are also there. visited this place with friends and have spend 2 hours easily.

title: Perhaps being Catholic?
review_text: Really emotional experience seeing how Mother Teresa lived. Her spartan living quarters show the sacrifices she made while reaching out to the poor. If you have a spiritual nature you will be moved.

title: Typical Kolkata Street
review_text: Typical Kolkata Street. Street food is good but not maintained that kind of hygiene. Eat your own risk.

title: Kolkata, of the Burra Sahib of yore
review_text:
My association with this street, apart from the fact that I have an office here, is the restaurant circuit. The best of continental fare is aggregated here. Places like Mocambo, Peter Cat, Volga etc dish outvreal amazing delicacies. Prices are moderate, service and decor exudes that old world charm. 
The Park hotel has some decent pubs and clubs. And the icing on the street, literally, would be Fleury's. Drop in here for you fix of cakes and pastries. 

Overall, this part of Kolkata still preserves the British Era old world charm

title: Festive Spirit
review_text: Though I am now staying more in Kolkata and am now having a first hand experience of many things, I was amazed at the life of Park Street last year during Christmas.So this year, when my wife and one of my sons were here during just before Christmas and again on 3rd January, we took visits to Park Street just to soak in the festivities. The sparkling Lights, the songs and performances, the various eatery stalls, the festive mood of the people, the dress the make ups-- wow, what a crowd and what fun. If you do not actually get into it first hand, one cannot understand why Kolkata is truly called the City of Joy. There was joy everywhere. I would strongly recommend to everyone to spend atleast one Christmas in Kolkata to experience it. More

title: Busy street
review_text: It is a very busy street in the whole Kolkata and I am very happy and I made a lot of shopping and some street food thsre

title: Just a road
review_text: This road is very famous in this city. Me along with my friends roamed all this park street. At that time there was lot of crowd over there.

title: Street of contrasts
review_text:
Incredibly busy road with both traffic and pedestrians. Big new buildings alongside old worn out buildings and there are street vendors all around. Not suitable if you have a mobility problem as the pavements are very uneven where tree roots have pushed up the stones and in some cases have large holes where the slabs have disappeared - a bit treacherous for the unwary at night. 

Good selection of restaurants up and down the road to suit a variety of budgets and preferences. Lots of shops and stalls and even a western type supermarket although you do need to check your bag at the entrance and they give you a fob. Collect bags on way out and show your receipt if you have made any purchases. More

title: The crown jewel of kolkata
review_text:
This place never disappoints you when you are in the mood to have fun or hang out. It has all the well known eatery joints from Hard Rock Cafe to the legendary Flurys to Arsalan. You name the cuisine , this place has it. Park Street lights up at night and the place comes to life!!! Young and old people all join in unison to have fun with friends and family. 
To conclude I would simply put it. If you are in kolkata you have to be here!!!

title: Known and buzzing street in Kolkata
review_text: It's right in the center of the city with many known landmarks. Must visit if you are visiting Kolkata for the first time.

title: Hub of Central Kolkata
review_text: Park Street is a must for visitors to Kolkata. Some of the best restaurants and bars are along Park Street. There are fine hotels and good book stores.

title: Eat Street
review_text: This is where most of the iconic eateries are located. We ate at Kwality, Flurry's, Mocambo and Ping's Cafe Orient (which I am happy to recommend).

title: Oh My Park Street
review_text: A must visit place especially during the year end to see the decorated lights covering the lengths of the street. The place has many old restaurants like Mocambo, Peter Cat, Moulin Rogue etc , Flury's. You should feel a different nostalgia. Also don't forget to visit the Oxford shop below the portico of the Park Hotel.

title: A must see
review_text: This is essentialy the heart of Kolkata or in other words, this place lies in the heart of every kolkatan. A tourist would find an array of restaurants serving various cuisines. The age hold flurys and trincas still hold fort. Once can also enjoy a cuppa surfing through the pages of a book in the oxford book store.

title: Hyperactive
review_text: Our hotel was in esplanade and thus we passed the park street market several times. The cloth shops shoe shops knickknacks and several uppity shops in between, make up a medley of shopping bonanza. Between all this a star hotel lurking behind make a heady mix. The complete cacophony of venders cries create a dizzy feeling. Not to be missed.

title: Park Street- The City of Joy
review_text: Visit to Kolkata can’t be complete without a visit to this legendary location . Pubs, bars, restaurant, books, shopping everything is there in British time legacy . Evening becomes mesmerising with lights & sound. A must eat is Kusum egg roll & Shiraz Biryani.The restaurant Peter cat & Flurries the pastry shop are must visit

title: Great place for good food
review_text: This place caters for many good restaurants with good quality of food. There is oxfords bookstore for book lovers. Christmas in Park Street is very well decorated but very crowded.

title: Good place
review_text: Good place with decent options for food and leisure.. I enjoyed my visit there... Will prefer to go there again on my next visit...

title: oh Calcutta
review_text: sexy place. park Street is a place where you can get each and every thing.be it food, shopping, having fun, parties.

title: Lights, Sound and Music
review_text: My friends from different states,m they might not agree with me that Kolkata is completely different from all other cities because for me Kolkata is so wonderful, the only reason is that it is more of human than a city. It has its own rhythm and music. Park Street is the heart of the town, you want to have great food, you want to get drunk, you want posh restaurants, you want the first ever pub in india its all here. From Amitabh Bachan to Rahul Gandhi from business tycoons to common man and all other film stars, it is the place where you get feel of out of this world. This city was built by the Britishers and this place still carries those marks. More

title: Famous street of kolkata
review_text: Park street is a famous street in kolkata. It is a hub of famous restaurants and clubs in the city. During christmas, new year and durga puja the street is very beautifully decorated.

title: One way system that changes!
review_text: We thought the taxi driver was having us on, but we witnessed the changing of the one-way system at 1pm. Some great places to eat on Park Street.

title: Park Street
review_text: A wonderful throwback in terms of architecture, centre of the city hotspots and location of some of the city's best restaurants. Oxford Bookstore is a must see, although their stock of books are generally limited and dated.

title: Cultural hub of Calcutta
review_text: Something about just walking down Park Street was great. One can almost feel the cultural grace of Kolkata (as compared to other cities in India) a must todo in Kolkata

title: Hive of activity
review_text: Shops, restaurants cafes are here in large numbers along with many global outlets. Full on traffic, so our driver let us out when stopped at a red light, we then negotiated our way onto the footpath, if tall be aware of low hanging power lines.

title: An Evening well Spent in Kolkata
review_text: Park Street is full of Brand Shops, Restaurants, fun Shopping out there with all the best lightning all over the Street. The street is full of Colors in the Evening a must visit place in Kolkata.

title: Best place for hangout
review_text: Park Street is the best for hangout. Many showrooms of different brands are here. Many nice restaurants are also on the both sides of the road.

title: Shopping
review_text: Park street is one of the popular street in Kolkata savings lots of boutiques & eateries. If your hotel is around you can go for promenade.

title: A must visit
review_text: Park Street has a lot to offer. I love the coffee shops in this street. A wonderful row of shops and also nice hotels in this area. Nearby are parks and gardens and wonderful places to stroll. Wear comfortable sandals and you good to go for an adventurous stroll. A nice place for solo travelers to stay. A little far from airport though.

title: Great for food, bars and shopping
review_text: The place is one of the more posh areas in Kolkata. You can chill at the hard rock cafe, or look for your favourite book at Oxford Street store or shop at the many stores on this road.

title: Bustling crowds
review_text: The bustling centre of the city. Really busy at Christmas with locals taking pictures. Lots of shops and food. Great atmosphere.

title: Amazing experience at the beautiful market.
review_text: It was a great experience to all sorts of business to find at one single location plus all types of food choices available as well.

title: Happening place in Kolkatta
review_text: But there were many other places you get the good stuff, but this road is very busy and big enough for you to spend your day if you have one day in Kolkata and didn't know what to do? visit this place and you will enjoy

title: "The" area for shops and entertainment
review_text:
Park street has been a hub for people to 
Enjoy in downtown Kolkata-- for decades. We walked all through the area yesterday-- and enjoyed several restaurants and coffee shops. Nice chance to see life all around.

title: Business with Satiated Taste Palate
review_text:
The business as well as the heart of eatery joints in Cal. A place immersed in history - legacy - business & culture. 

Mother Teresa and Usha Uthup both very strong ladies with diverse background and genre of work- started their life in early 20s from here.

title: The hotspot Park Street
review_text: It is very centrally located, a piece of history of Kolkata where britishers would fine dine and also reside. It still has a few of the best restaurant of Kolkata and becomes quite vibrant during Christmas.

title: The Christmas Hub
review_text: Park Street is the place to enjoy your winters in Kolkata. It is a heritage place for Christmas celebrations with its own charm and style. It is a hub of several old restaurant and bars, the famous Flurys, Peter Cat, Bar-b-que to enjoy the favourite delicacies. The old buildings and shops with glamour and fashion surrounds the area and attracts youngsters to stroll around without getting tired. One of my favourite place in Kolkata never to be missed out.

title: Best of Kolkata in one Street
review_text: Every city or town has a road or street that defines it and for Kolkata that place is Park Street! Its got all the beauty the city has to offer on one strip of land, famous brands, eateries and funzones. Park hotel and Hard Rock Cafe are just a few to name. A visit here is a must when at Kolkata.

title: Awesome place
review_text: Awesome place for funloving people. Must visit during Christmas seasons. Happiness and fun is dissolved in the air of park street.

title: Great place to visit
review_text: The heart of Kolkata, the Park Street area is a must for any visitor to the city. A combination of old world charm with its historical ambiance, and a variety of shopping and eating places makes it an absolutely worthwhile experience.

title: Shopping, fun and food
review_text: There is a shopping mall on Park Street Quest. It’s big with food zone and multiplex. There are many other shopping options on the road along with Food

title: Old British lane
review_text: It’s one of the oldest Road of citi constructed by britisher. You will find most expensive shops of the city on this road.

title: Amazing
review_text: Come visit one of the most talked about Street of Kolkata.lined up with shops and restaurants this place is heart of Kolkata.do visit

title: A little England in India
review_text: Old stone structures.. White buildings.. Gives a feel of Old India.. u tend to go into trance while visiting this place.. It’s beautiful and many good places to hangout..

title: Market Place
review_text: In Kolkata Park Street is the famous place for hangout, shopping. Many youngstars are go there for shopping there is a large market you can get anything from there

title: Everything is good in park street , Bars, Restaurants , Hotels , Mkt.
review_text:
Great experience, we all fully enjoyed this journey. 
Like fun in Bars , restaurants & Hotel. 
Food quality is also very good

title: Street which never sleeps!
review_text: Most happening place of Kolkata! You just name it you gonna find all branded shops great options for dining!

title: A great walk in the heart of the city .
review_text: Although a this is a business street ,the street is full of new and old buildings and so many eating places . Very busy but safe and exciting for walking and shopping.

title: Soak into the old charm
review_text: Combination of everything is Park street. Good Bars, Speciality Restaurants, Book Store, Chaa Bar, Old post office, Auction Houses, Anand Boutique, Good Samaritan Shop for handmade article, Sunflower Saloon for excellent hair cut for ladies, Flury's for breakfast n tea, Church at Loretto, Kathi Roll at Kusum, Foreign magazines at Foot Path So many thing at one place !

title: The place to be
review_text: so we went to kolkata during thhis christmas period and trust me the lighting, the crowd, the live band, the food, the people and surrounding of this place was awesome. enjoyed a lot. great night life, great options for food and shopping

title: Always something to see
review_text: I love the frenetic buzz in this street. There is always new sights, smells and interesting people. Shopping can be very cheap and no shortage of food vendors. Quintessential India I think.

title: HOT & HAPPENING PLACE
review_text: One of the most hot & happening place in Kolkata.Lot of restaurants with different types of Cusine,Bars & Night Club.

title: I must visit for every visitor
review_text: Park Street is among my favourite place to hang out. Be it with friends or family or for a business meet. The place has to offer for every type of visitors, the young couple, family, friends group or business meeting. Its the best place for fine dining in Kolkata around the year.

title: Christmas visit
review_text: Park Street .....one of the posh areas of kolkata......with many branded shops .....hotels, bars and restaurants, fast food, ice cream stalls and market..... Christmas celebration is to the peak here.....

title: Interesting place to soak in the glorious past of the town
review_text:
Once the heart of the city, it is slowly losing its pride of place to other newcomers, especially the modern shopping malls growing all over the city. Yet, the place has lots to offer even today, be it restaurants like Trincas, Kwality, Peter Cat, and Flurys, pubs like Olypub, or small eating joints like Kathi Roll for the mouthwatering rolls, or Art Gallery Chemould, or the street corner bookshops. Every Kolkatan will vouch for it. 
Recently the Government and other agencies have been trying to promote the place during festivals like Christmas and New Year and the place is really happening around these times or even on Saturday nights.

title: Good place to walk out
review_text:
if you like to shopping and get some recreation , you can move there, you will get some good shops like fast track. 
moreover their are some good bar too.

title: Park Street....The Heart .....In the City of Joy
review_text:
visited this place on 6/1/18....Its a very happening place, With the New year's decoration still in place, Its a amazing walk at night through this place, 
It houses some of teh city's old,landmarks outlets and restaurants...Peter Cat,Flurys

title: The street that never sleeps- Park Street- Kolkata
review_text: It is one of the important streets of Kolkata. Famous for its night life it has many pubs and restaurants - Trincas, Blue Fox, Bar B Q, Moulin Rouge, Oly Pub. The Park Hotel, St. Xavier College , cemetery, are part of this historic street. The street is connected with all important streets like Camac Street, wood Street , Park Circus , Middleton Row. You will love the energy that the place create. It is the most happening and thriving street of Kolkata. You just can’t afford to miss Park Street and it’s surroundings..

title: Heart of kolkata
review_text: It is the most fantastic place in kolkata if you want anything to shop it is the best place we see every brand. It is also called as heart of kolkata. Have a chai, some brisk walk in the evening, nothing to shop, but u will be carried away.

title: Best place for NYE
review_text:
Most happening place to be on New Years Eve. It's the party hub of kolkata. 
Most of the parties happen in the hotels around.

title: Kolkata central location
review_text: Worth going for restaurants, traditional old town not worth going for shopping malls are better, hard crossing the road, morning traffic goes one way in one direction afternoon goes in other direction.

title: All the variety of food you'll ever need
review_text: Park street has so much good fooood!This is the place to be for night life too. Holiday lights were still up in Jan. Very festive!

title: Worth watching in night
review_text:
It I marker place worth watching in night during new year time. 
When the entire street is decorated with lightning on the line of Singapore.

title: The happening place of Kolkata!!
review_text: It's in the heart of Kolkata where you will find the oldest n the best restaurants of the city..be it Mocambo,PeterCat,Flury's Moulin Rouge n the list goes on.Come December and the area is decked up for Christmas and New year.Something new I noticed this year..the pulled down shutters have become an art platform n it looks wonderful!!

title: Eat, Drink and be Merry
review_text: Just walking down the street from the Chowringhee side is fun. Every few yards there's a restaurant or bar, each one is different from the other and seems to have a story to tell. The hawkers on the pavement sell a variety of stuff and one can easily spend a few hours window shopping.

title: happening place
review_text: Park street is one of the most happening place ever.There are so many music bars all around. One can enjoy the nite over there. It is the most happening place of kolkata.

title: Heart of the city!
review_text: Park street is the city centre of kolkata.. with unlimited options for dining - restaurants, cafes, pubs, clubs, you cannot get bored! The vibe is lively and the architecture gives a different feel to the city.. there are also shopping options (no malls though).. the street is lively thrlughout the year but best time to visit would be christmas and new years as the environment is super pumped! If in kolkata, do not miss this iconic street!

title: The great Bazaar...
review_text: I think there is nothing on this street that is not available in the world. I won’t be exaggerating if I may say so. From street food to five star hotels and great restaurants to shopping, specially street shopping and ever crowded Park Street is the life of Kolkata..... just go and enjoy the every point of this street, however be ready to deal with variety of crowds.... if you enjoy the hustle bustle of the streets then yes this is the place for every tourist who visits Kolkata

title: Nice place to shop and walk around
review_text: It's a good place for walks with your friends. Lots of high ends shops and restaurants, including the famous The Park. But there's still some litters around. Evenings are mostly crowded. But I love this place in Kolkata

title: Party hub
review_text:
It's the party hub of Kolkata. 
Millions of dining options and party options as well. 
Only drawback is that it's getting too overcrowded now....

title: great concentration of restaurants
review_text: strolling in Park Street is always fun. Many good restaurants and classic places (some dodgy as well). To be avoided at all cost on New Year's eve, as the crowd is huge.

title: Park street on New Years eve
review_text:
This is just an amazing place especially on newyears eve. We were on the park street at 12 night on 31st. The atmosphere can just be felt. It can not be described in the words. Lacs of people on the street just moving around and shouting. That can just be felt. 
Otherwise this is an upscale market place in Kolkata. You get lot of good eating joints as well as restos in this area.

title: Park street at Night
review_text: Activity and lively. Good food and drink at reasonable rates. Plenty of decorations and pretty to look at.

title: Soul of Kolkata
review_text: The most loving area in Kolkota. Major commercial activities are housed in the vicinity. The Park street is about 6 kms from Howrah Railway Station. The nearest Metro station is Esplanade. The street is always is a attraction but for his liveliness. To have an experience there at for Shopping,Hotels, Eating, Roaming is wonderful. It is to be stated hear that the Park Street is Heart and Soul of Kolkota. .

title: No place like Park Street
review_text: If you want to experience Christmas and New Year with a difference go to Park Street. Of course you will need to deal with crowds and long queues but then everyone is out to have a blast. The decorations took my breath away. The security and traffic arrangements deserve a special mention as not many cities will pay attention to these aspects

title: Busy n buzz as always
review_text: A visit to the place lit all round for the festivities certainly raises the adrenaline. Brings back lifted spirits

title: Shopping Experience on the busy streets of Kolkata
review_text:
You will definitely find this place "Park Street" to be a crowded destination. We had been here for shopping and reaching here was time consuming as it was "Muharam" and few places were blocked for procession, post reaching you are in between this crowded street trying to find a shop and on a humid afternoon was really a tiring experience. 

Few things to remember: 

*It's better to avoid shopping on weekends 
*Bargain as much as you can, as they quote unrealistic prices in different shops (check in few shops before buying what you want)

title: A party street Park street
review_text: This is the most happening place in Kolkata. In Christmas and new year this place become key attraction of Kolkata city. Many holels, clubs and bars are located in this area. This is also famous for delicious street food. This place is easily accessible using public transports.

title: Festive walk during holidays
review_text: One of the most festive places you will ever be at during the holidays; wonderfully decorated with Christmas lights and acts that will truly amaze you as you walk thru Park street but it is very crowded so be vigilant on your vigilant of your pockets and belongings. They are live acts on the corner of Camac street and Festival of Lights from the corner of Free School street to Chowringhee and worth the walk.

title: History for you to witness & experience first hand..
review_text:
Park Street,the most happening place in Kolkata.It's a foodies paradise.Whatever be your preference,you will have a restaurant to cater to it.Must visit restaurants...Peter Cat, Barbeque, Olympia pub, Trincas, Flury's & many more.The latest addition is the famous chain..Hard Rock Cafe. 

Come over & experience variety.Experiece Park Street, Kolkata

title: GREAT STREET FOR CHRISTMAS & NRW YEAR FESTIVALS
review_text: It is wonderful street for Christmas & new year celebrations.As this street design & prepared specially for this festivals. It had great history of kolkata.

title: Main city life
review_text: Park street the main place for all the visitor and tourist because all the restaurant,night club,shopping center,food court,tourist office,cafe,disco are located here,can be reach easily,if you are looking for night life in Kolkata then you have to reach here but beware of pick pockets.

title: Nice shopping street
review_text: A nice street to do shopping when in Kolkata. You have lots of showrooms and good eating joints. A must visit during your stay in Kolkata.

title: Best place to stroll in Kolkota
review_text: Best place to stroll in Kolkata for shopping and you can also expect delicious juices here in the road side. You can very cheap clothes in this place.

title: Must visit area
review_text: This place got all. starting from food to shopping, hotels, money exchange, New market area is walking distance. Camac street is also walking distance.

title: Evening at Park Street
review_text: December is the time when this place becomes very lively. The entire place gets a face-lift and decorate itself to celebrate Christmas and the New Year. I visited this place on 1st January.

title: nice walk
review_text: an interesting area to see and experience... got to this road searching for the burial ground of Mother Theresa of Calcutta... after paying a respect and seeng museum inside teh Mother's House.. we took a rickshaw on our way back to Park Street - a major thoroughfare... got to shop souvenir items, eat and buy books along the street...

title: Its the heart of festivals in Kolkata during Cristmas
review_text: Park street has its own history, a location usually resided by the upper middle class and high class people. Number of good restaurants and shopping malls and shops are in and around the street. It is not just a street. It is a residential area, area of good hotels and rental services, schools, churches, mosque, mandirs. A place of harmony in terms of religion, culture, customs, norms and values. Park Street has the oldest cemetry, from the time of 1700 which is a good starting point to know about Kolkata during the east India company rule in Indian Subcontinent and growth of Kolkata as a city to a mega city. I spent hours just walking around the Park Street. Its now the junction or transition point of structural changes. Many new designed buildings are occupying spaces of the 100 years old buildings of 1800 and 1900 century. If you like to buy wedding cloths this is one of the best though bit costly place. More

title: Always impressive
review_text: Been to park street after a long time but I still enjoy the feeling of the place.It has the old but elegant Calcutta feel.

title: 30th and 31st revelry
review_text: Always wanted to see the revelry and Christmas celebrations in Kolkata... lots of lights and decorations with orderly crowd thanks to efficient Police bandobast..

title: The place is good during Christmas and New Year
review_text: I have visited the place during Christmas and it is very well decorated with lights. Also there are lots of other places and restaurant. One may visit in the late night also during New Year eve.

title: Its magic on 31st night
review_text: Very much a core of Kolkata , it has lots of schools , hotels , offices , street food and what not ... Always busy . However the period from 25th Dec to 1st Jan ... its magic at night , walking in the chill with the heavily illuminated road is an experience by itself

title: Never Loses Its Magic
review_text:
Park Street is a central street in Calcutta... Or now as it is known as Kolkata. But Park Street more belongs to Calcutta, as it has that colonial past. Within a 2 km radius, best of old colonial Calcutta is located as also all the old favourite restaurants, though some have downed shutters. 
This street has been magically done up with lights this New Year and has become a veritable fairyland. There are strings of lights, festivities on at Allen Park, the restaurants have their decorations and so on. Quite charming ... And the lights are better than quite a number of places in USA, Europe, South-East Asian countries where I have spent Christmas. 
The only disadvantage is that it is so very crowded. More

title: Park Street
review_text: Can be considerd as a heart of city. Tourist from all nation could be seen here. So many hotels (almost 10 in every lane) will welcome you. N park street never sleeps.

title: Heart of the city!!
review_text: Best time to visit here is in the year end as during this period entire area gets into a festive mood with foods, Lights, cultural programs. Just step in and feel the magic!!

title: Nice street, in the city of Joy
review_text:
In the city of joy, one can't ask for something better than a street, full of shopping options, like this one. You can find almost everything here, & in the surrounding areas. It's kind of place that is for everyone, kids, adults, couples, everyone. 
One can have enough fun here. In short this is the place to visit.

title: Street full of Lights
review_text: We were staying in Park Hotel on Park Street during December 23-26 . Park street during this period was very well illuminated and as usual very crowded.

title: Never seen like this before
review_text: I was on this street on the Christmas Eve the place was awesome. Whole street was decorated in essence of Christmas. The thing which I admired the most was ever one was in joyfull mood.youngsters as well as whole families including elderly and very young. There are many restaurants on this street all were running full.i had a different experience.

title: enjoyable walk
review_text: a nice and colourful and lively road to stroll .lots of restaurants on this road.a very lively road specially from 25th dec to 1st jan

title: Great place for shopping and beautifully decorated for Christmas!
review_text:
You will find a lot of boutique style shops here. Do not just visit the overrated shops 
you have heard from your relatives. Walk a few distance and you will be surprised to find shops with amazing collection at good price. 

Back again for a family visit. Loved how it’s decorated for Christmas! Gives a little European feel to the city of joy. My little one loved the reindeers!

title: Found a club and decent shopping
review_text:
You can find a decent club near park street.cant remember the name we asked young guys hanging about and they were spot on. 
My shopping in kolkata was done only there

title: Very nice marketplace
review_text:
It is know as huge marketplace of Kolkata. 
You can see lots of shops of jellerys, clothes and lots more. I recommend to come here when you are in Kolkata.

title: Still full of life after so many years.
review_text: Great to see Flury's still being the destination restaurant. Sareewalas maintained their reputation of being the nightmare for the poor hubbys.

title: Great shopping street
review_text:
This one is a great shipping street also with good options to eat. 
There are some very good shops and restaurants here.

title: Park Street
review_text: Today is 25th December and this place is decorated as princess. The place is very beautiful to see. Love.

title: Amazing walking plaza, lots to do....
review_text: I loved this street, its amazing. Lots of stuff to do other than the British Pub "Someplace Else", pick a book from Oxford store & read it in the attic Cha Bar sipping amazing tea from a long list of Teas served. Not to forget, if you are allowed visit The Free Masons Hall.

title: Park Street is for foodies
review_text: Whenever I'm in Kolkata, I try to visit Park Street for the awesome variety of food it offers. Chaat lovers must visit. You must try : PUCHKA,JHAALMURI,CHILLA,ALOO CHAAT and so many other delicacies. Number of restaurants are here offering wide variety of national and international cuisine.

title: Happening place of Kolkata
review_text:
The usual happening place of Kolkata. Went there on Christmas Eve this year and was usual filled with lights and people. Having food in the best restaurants of the town is itself a great pleasure here. However getting over to other sides of the road can be little hazardous due to huge traffic on the road. Sometimes it's little Disturbing with lots of beggars around. 
If you are in Kolkata, you must visit here for shopping and food. Ofcourse it's a must during Christmas - new year period.

title: A must visit in December!!
review_text: Park Street is the most happening places in Kolkata, in December.The whole street is decked up during the second half of this month to usher in Christmas and New Year!!

title: Lively place in south Kolkata
review_text: Traditional old buildings and food joint in the heart of Kolkota. Shopping, coffee shop, book shops, street food, eating joints. This place is happening and has everything.

title: Park Street reminds of Orchard Street Singapore
review_text: Park Street is busy street focussing the history of British rule,it has good shopping elegant happennings specially in Christmas and New year the street will atke you to any foreign country reminding of Orchard street,good food,happening,good branded and other shopping ,places for all agaes on Park street

title: Park Street Foodies Paradise
review_text:
Park Street is centrally located in Kolkata Surrounded with few of the best eateries & Bars, Boasting restaurants as old 50+ Years. Recently the Hard Rock has also opened in Park street, there are still old building of the British era in the area. 
Restaurent & Eatries recommended: 
1. Bar b Que 
2. Flavor of China 
3. One step Up. 
4. Mocambo 
5, Peter Cat 
6. Mamagato 
7. Hakunamatata

10.Gangaur
